title: My respone of the incoming Rengar update
body: As we know, assassins will be undated in the incoming patchs. And Rengar is one of the champ appear in the list. No one knows rengar will be nerfed (rework) or  buffed, but I Rengar's oneshot ability should not be nerfed coz this is one of the reason why Rengar players like playing Rengar. Even tho I know it is inescapable but I hope it wont be a horrible change.

replies.body:
Where is Furret? 

Battle Bunny Rengar!!!

Q damage on turrets should return.

:^)

obviously the biggest and pretty much the only problem with rengar is his 1 shotting. can you not suggest such selfish and cringey ideas, you may aswell be whining that hes gonna lose the 1 thing that makes rengar so bad for the game
